data.name: CoinTracker
data.description: A blockchain analysis tool useful for inspecting a given blockchain to discover the legality of transactions/coins for defined jurisdictions

data.name: Campus Blockchain
data.description: A framework developed for Campus blockchain (for Academic and Corporate campuses). It was developed to research scalability and infrastructure of blockchains.

data.name: AgriChain
data.description: A blockchain-based end-to-end supply chain management platform for perishable items like fruits and vegetables.
